text: The Pribilof Islands (formerly the Northern Fur Seal Islands; ) are a group of four volcanic islands off the coast of mainland Alaska. They are in the Bering Sea, about north of Unalaska and southwest of Cape Newenham. The Siberian coast is roughly northwest. They are about in total area. They are mostly rocky and are covered with tundra. At the 2010 census, the population was 572. Category:Islands of Alaska
title: Pribilof Islands
